features: Fast Rebound Memory Foam: Please note that this is Firm Support, this pillow cushion is supportive and FIRM, NOT SOFT !!

Best Memory Foam Seat Cushion: It provides additional support you need to maintain good posture and the natural curve of the spine. Our seat cushion helps to increase blood flow, especially suitable for those people spending 8 hours a day in a seated position.

Say Goodbye to Coccyx Pain: Our Chair cushion has an ergonomic "U" Shaped Cutout, designed to provide comfort by alleviating pressure on the lower back, waist, hips, leg and pregnancy pain relief. Supports tailbone and relieves pressure.

Transforms Any Chair: Great for office chair, game chair, car seat, any home chair or a seat on an airplane or train. It is suitable for office workers, drivers, teachers, students, pregnant women, travelers, etc.

Never Sit Uncomfortably Again: Lightweight and portable, this tailbone seat cushion has a non-slip rubber bottom that prevents slippage. Washable zippered velour cover for easy cleaning and built-in handle for easy carrying.
Firm & Supportive: Our office chair cushion is a perfect mix of firmness and comfort. It can be used to increase the height of any seat. Its large size 18"x 14"x 2.8".

Pressure & Pain Relief: The chair seat cushion is firm and comfortable enough, great for a bigger person. However, please allow a week for the cushion to restore its perfect appearance and allow yourself 1-3 weeks to adjust to the new feelings.

Lifetime Customer Service: At Bomdaia customer satisfaction is our top priority, pledging to replace your memory foam cushion should anything ever go wrong. Money back guarantee if you are not satisfied, no questions asked!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Put Your Body at Ease If you're sitting in your office, car or home for a long time, a proper seat cushion can make a world of difference. This desk chair cushion use the ergonomic U-shaped design can reduce the pressure on your waist and back, relief the pain in the buttocks, tailbone, and bring you the ultimate comfortable. This seat cushion pillowis is supportive and FIRM, NOT SOFT. So this seat cushion is more suitable for adults, especially big guy. But it is not very suitable for the elderly.

Excellent Memory Foam Cushion, Comfort Everywhere Our chair seat cushion suitable for any occasion, including office chairs, car seats, airplane chairs, terraces, garden chairs~ With easy-to-carry handle, high-quality non-slip mat, soft flannel pillow cover. Its large size 18"x 14"x 2.8" inch. Take the tailbone seat cushion with you as you drive to work, to the stadium, on road trips, and just about anywhere you want to go. (The coccyx cushion height is about 2.8'' inch and it will make your field of view 0.8'' inch higher when you are completely seated on the chair.)

Help with Relieve Pain: Low Back Pain & SciaticaCoccyx / Tailbone ReliefWaist / Back Reduce Pressure on the tailbonePain From Sitting Long Hours Bomdaia seat cushion is designed to help relieve aches and your pain, but for some people, it may not completely eliminate all symptoms. Your satisfaction is our highest priority, if you’re not satisfied, please let us know, we will serve until you are satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Cushion At a Reasonable Price
reviews.reviewText: I have severe arthritis with sciatic pain, and have bought other, more expensive cushions that compress so much (and so unevenly) that they sometimes cause more problems than they solve. These maintain a consistent firmness that provides just the right amount of both comfort and support, and the contoured shape is much more effective that just a rectangular or round cushion. I have one in my car and another on my desk chair, and they have been a significant improvement in the quality of my daily life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these cushions for my car, because I've shrunken over the years and my car's old enough not to have height adjustable seats. They're perfect for the car. Then I bought two more for my kitchen. They're great cushions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent product for the money.
reviews.reviewText: At first it was very comfortable and eased the tension in my back some. But shortly after it shrank in thickness and wasn't as effective. I do understand wear and tear applies to just about any product but this one seemed to wear thin quicker than I anticipated. Still somewhat comfortable though and a bargain for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Makes static like crazy
reviews.reviewText: So this seat is pretty good as far as softness and comfort goes. But... it's very shocking 🤣😅 for weeks (apparently since I got this cushion), the static in the house has been crazy. Every single time I sat down and got up from my desk chair, I or whoever I touched would be shocked by static electricity. Sometimes painfully. It was driving me crazy. I finally figured out that this cushion was the cause, the cushion cover specifically. Without the cover, the foam doesn't make the static. So, I guess I will be making a new cover for it. If static electricity is not for you, then this seat cushion is not for you unless you can make a different cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Luv the way it form to my body

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for stability!
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is all I had hoped it would be! It is sturdy and really relives a great deal of my spinal pain. I would certainly recommend it to everyone looking for a great cushion for chairs, sofas, and most of all for the seats in your vehicle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cushion for my shorty folks
reviews.reviewText: It's exactly what I needed in the salon that work at for all my ladies that don't quite fit in the shampoo bowl chair.
Received a dirty case and completely faulty zipper, not sure why they would sell it. The cushion itself works but is not very comfortable like the Aerostralia one.
